cn.name: cn
cn.description: Utility for merging Tailwind CSS classes

button.name: button
button.description: Angular button component with class-based styling

code-block.name: code-block
code-block.description: Code block component with VS Code-accurate syntax highlighting powered by Shiki. Includes copy button and language header.
code-block.note: Requires 'shiki' npm package. Supports 200+ languages and all VS Code themes.

preview-box.name: preview-box
preview-box.description: Tabbed preview component with Preview, Code, and Source tabs. Perfect for documentation sites.
preview-box.note: Uses code-block for syntax-highlighted code display in Code/Source tabs.

accordion.name: accordion
accordion.description: Angular accordion component for collapsible content sections. Built with Angular signals for accessibility.
accordion.note: Includes smooth expand/collapse animations. Supports single/multiple mode and collapsible options.

alert.name: alert
alert.description: Angular alert component for displaying important messages, errors, and notifications. Supports icons and multiple variants via Tailwind classes.
alert.note: Purely presentational component. No Angular CDK required. Use Alert Dialog for confirmation modals.
